attributes.action: make bantering an official sport in the London 2012 olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Petition to get Bantering as an official event into the London 2012 Olympic Games. Bantering will involve group discussions to see who can crack the most gags and gain the most laughs. Followed by one pair from each country choosing their Banter speciality: one on one, two on two or general chaos Bantering

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
